summary: This document is a title insurance policy issued by First American Title Insurance Company for a residential loan. It outlines the details of the insured mortgage, including the amount, property description, and exceptions from coverage. The policy is significant as it provides legal protection for the lender against potential losses related to the property.

persons.name: Dennis J. Gilmore
persons.context: Dennis J. Gilmore is identified as the President of First American Title Insurance Company, which issued the title insurance policy.

persons.name: Jeffrey S. Robinson
persons.context: Jeffrey S. Robinson is mentioned as the Secretary of First American Title Insurance Company, signing the title insurance policy.

keyFacts: The title insurance policy was issued on December 10, 2014, for a mortgage amount of $320,000.
The policy is for a one-to-four family residential structure located in Charlotte, North Carolina.
First American Title Insurance Company is the issuer of the policy, with Dennis J. Gilmore and Jeffrey S. Robinson as authorized officers.
The policy includes various endorsements and exceptions from coverage, detailing specific risks not insured against.
The document serves as a legal protection for the lender against potential losses related to the property.
